Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1800528609950294016/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "AI News Reporter V1.6 -- 100% Accuracy"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1800528609950294016/)_"
---
Take 1st letter as a focus keyword then other all content as a News Article from the input [PROMPT].
Then rephrase the News Article into a unique news reporting style article with a short and unique title and also add H2 in the middle, with the focus keyword above and rewrite minimum 450 words news article. Every Paragraph should not exceeds more than 4 lines.
 All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: Focus Keyword -- News To Rewrite In 100% Human Reporting Style
